result.execSummary:
The defendant Lurenzo N Baldwin was found guilty of the following charge(s) in this case.

  • Possession of THC, an unclassified misdemeanor, Wisconsin Statutes 961.41(3g)(e).

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

parties.name: Milwaukee County Clerk of Circuit Court

supervisions.notes: Pay costs, assessments and surcharges by 9-15-15 or a civil judgment is to be entered against the defendant and subject to other collection.

result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. Lurenzo N Baldwin

records.descr: Records of prosec. are converted data. See file.

records.addlTxt:
Sentencing proceeds.   Statements by counsel and defendant.

COURT ORDERS defendant to serve 3 days at the House of Correction with 3 days credit; pay costs, assessments and surcharges by 9-15-15  or a civil judgment is to be entered against the defendant and subject to other collection.

Appeal rights given.  Notice of Right to Seek Postconviction Relief received and filed.

Defendant waives constitutional rights, enters a plea of GUILTY to the amended charge and is examined as to the plea.  Plea Questionnaire/Waiver of Rights and Addendum  received and filed.  Parties stipulate to the Complaint as a factual basis for judgment.  Court finds defendant guilty as charged in the Amended Information and enters a judgment of conviction.

Defendant Lurenzo N Baldwin in court with attorney Alejandro A. Lockwood.  Dennis P. Murphy appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Deputy Clerk;ds

Case transferred from Br. 03 forthwith for plea and sentencing.  Amended Information received and filed.  Parties acknowledge receipt of the a copy of the Amended Information and waives reading.  On motion of the State, Court AMENDS the charge to Possession of THC 961.41(3g)(e) an unclassified misdemeanor.
Justice Point Pretrial Services Report received and filed.  aw

Court addresses violation report filed 7/2/2014.  Court contacted Justice Point.  A letter will be sent to the defendant regarding missed contact.  The next contact is set for 7/7/2014.  Court will be advised if defendant appears.  Court takes no action at this time.  aw
Justice Point Pretrial Services Violation Report received and filed for missed office contact.  aw
Justice Point Pretrial Services Report received and filed.  aw

Defendant Lurenzo N Baldwin in court with attorney Alejandro A Lockwood.  Stephan E Nolten appeared for the State of Wisconsin for Dennis Murphy.
Defense counsel has been in negotiations with ADA Murphy, and requests a plea date.  Case adjourned for plea and sentencing on 9/18/2014 at 8:30 am, branch 3.  Court reminds defendant to stay clean while case is pending.  aw  Plea/sentencing hearing scheduled for September 18, 2014 at 08:30 am.

Defendant Lurenzo N Baldwin in court with attorney Alejandro A Lockwood.  Dennis P Murphy appeared for the State of Wisconsin.
Defense counsel needs more time to go over discovery with client.  Case adjourned for scheduling conference on 6/17/2014 at 8:30 am, branch 3.  Court reminds defendant to not use or possess any controlled substances without a valid prescription.  aw  Scheduling conference scheduled for June 17, 2014 at 08:30 am.

Defendant Lurenzo N Baldwin in court with attorney Alexis R Liggins who appears for Alejandro Lockwood.  Carole Manchester appeared for the State of Wisconsin.
  ENTRY MADE WITHOUT THE COURT FILE.  Present in court is Justice Point worker Abbehi Medrano.  Case in court due to violation.  Arguments heard as to bail.  Court admonishes Defendant.  No action taken at this time.  Case remains calendared for Scheduling Conference on May 19, 2014 at 8:30 a.m. in Branch 3.
-Scanned; ENTRY MADE WITHOUT COURT FILE.   Deputy Court Clerk: TC.

Defendant Lurenzo N Baldwin in court with attorney Alejandro A Lockwood.  Nathaniel Adamson for Dennis P Murphy appeared for the State of Wisconsin. 
Defendant waived Preliminary Hearing.  Preliminary Hearing Questionnaire and Waiver received and filed. Court found probable cause and bound defendant over for trial.  Defendant is advised this case is assigned to Judge Fiorenza, Branch 03.  Original Information filed.  Copy given to defense counsel who waived reading.  Defendant pleads not guilty.  Scheduling conference scheduled for May 19, 2014 at 08:30 am.

Filed, Justice Point Pretrial Report dated 4/25/14.
css

Court orders defendant TURNED OVER to JUSTICE Point for Supervision.  ABSOLUTE SOBRIETY  to be monitored by drug testing and portable breathalyzers.  No use or possession of controlled substances without a valid prescription taken in the manner and fashion as prescribed, no alcohol.  Defendant advised it is a requirement to attend all future court proceedings.  Failure to comply with conditions of bail may result in an additional charge of bail jumping.

Defendant Lurenzo N Baldwin in court with attorney Alejandro A Lockwood.  Defendant Lurenzo N Baldwin in custody.  Carole R Manchester appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Defendant is advised this case is assigned to Judge Fiorenza, Branch 03.  
Defendant given a copy of the complaint and advised of maximum penalties, right to counsel and right to a preliminary hearing.  Court reviewed the complaint and found probable cause to hold defendant for further proceedings.  DEFENDANT IS INDIGENT AND PUBLIC DEFENDER WILL PROVIDE COUNSEL.  Preliminary hearing scheduled for April 28, 2014 at 01:30 pm.
